pageContext.provenance:
- A church in New Haven, Connecticut
- Given to artist J.H. Dreesen in lieu of payment for decorating the interior of the church in the 1920s
- Then by descent to the present owners
- Skinner Auctions, Boston, February 7, 2014, Auction 2704B, Lot 300
